languages.text: "Я приказал{mf||а} губернатору Драйвстему преподать роду Гапрак урок в назидание за то, что случилось с Кьявой Гамма. Надеюсь, ты его усвоила?"

traits.locale_text: "Я приказал{mf||а} губернатору Драйвстему преподать роду Гапрак урок в назидание за то, что случилось с Кьявой Гамма. Надеюсь, ты его усвоила?"

languages.text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"
languages.original_text: "Я приказал{mf||а} губернатору Драйвстему преподать роду Гапрак урок в назидание за то, что случилось с Кьявой Гамма. Надеюсь, ты его усвоила?"

traits.locale_text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"
"I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"
"I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"
"I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"
"I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"

languages.text: “基亚瓦伽马星发生了那样的事情，我曾命令德莱夫斯塔总督对贾帕克家族进行惩处。你从这件事情里吸取到教训了吗？”
languages.original_text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"

traits.locale_text: “基亚瓦伽马星发生了那样的事情，我曾命令德莱夫斯塔总督对贾帕克家族进行惩处。你从这件事情里吸取到教训了吗？”

languages.text: "Ich habe Gouverneur Drivestem befohlen, Haus Gaprak eine Lektion dafür zu erteilen, was mit Kiava Gamma geschehen ist. Wage ich zu hoffen, dass Ihr diese Lektion gelernt habt?"
languages.original_text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Gouverneur Drivestem befohlen, Haus Gaprak eine Lektion dafür zu erteilen, was mit Kiava Gamma geschehen ist. Wage ich zu hoffen, dass Ihr diese Lektion gelernt habt?"

languages.text: « J'ai ordonné au gouverneur Drivestem de donner une leçon à la maison Gaprak pour ce qu'il s'est passé sur Kiava Gamma. J'espère que vous l'avez bien retenue. »
languages.original_text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai ordonné au gouverneur Drivestem de donner une leçon à la maison Gaprak pour ce qu'il s'est passé sur Kiava Gamma. J'espère que vous l'avez bien retenue. »

languages.text: «Ordené al gobernador Drivestem que diera una severa lección a la casa Gaprak por lo sucedido en Kiava Gamma. Espero que la hayan aprendido».
languages.original_text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"

traits.locale_text: «Ordené al gobernador Drivestem que diera una severa lección a la casa Gaprak por lo sucedido en Kiava Gamma. Espero que la hayan aprendido».

languages.text: 「ドライベステム総督には、キアヴァ・ガンマでの出来事に関して、ガプラック家に教訓を与えるよう命じた。貴方がそれをしっかり学んだと、期待してもよろしいかね？」
languages.original_text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"

traits.locale_text: 「ドライベステム総督には、キアヴァ・ガンマでの出来事に関して、ガプラック家に教訓を与えるよう命じた。貴方がそれをしっかり学んだと、期待してもよろしいかね？」

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem'e Kiava Gama'da olanlar yüzünden Gaprak Hanesi'ne bir ders vermesini emrettim. Umarım herkes dersini almıştır..."
languages.original_text: "I ordered Governor Drivestem to teach House Gaprak a lesson for what happened to Kiava Gamma. Dare I hope that you have learned it well?"
